word:
Much love to dear Sister Gorham. Tell her to be strong. God is with her and He will not leave her. Much love to you all. I hope the children will not get sleepy, but will be interested in the truth and be diligent to make their calling and election sure. Write, be sure and write, and do not do as I have done. I love you, all of you. Write.--Letter 28, 1850. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. Sept. 2, 1986. Entire Letter.
